title: Flat stage finale
text:
Do 3 times, 1 km. each:

From the lead group, make check :+1d:
:d1: :d2: No breakaway attempt.
:d3: Put 'small breakaway' on table.
:d4: Put 'rouleurs breakaway' on table.
:d5: Put 'adventurer breakaway' on table.
:d6: Put 'puncheur breakaway' on table;
With initially 10 sec. ahead

Finally: sprint with lead group(s).
